TopicTitle: Kerbal Great Game - Gameplay Is Starting

Articles.Content:
You might have saw the old Kerbal Great Game thread (it was linked to in my signature), where I was talking about making a Kerbal Great Game. I've came here with great news: thanks entirely to the leadership of Randomness5555 (seriously, thank him), gameplay is beginning over at the website.

Since the gameplay involves controlling a nation on the surface of Kerbin, obviously actual gameplay will occur at the website. Feel free to ask questions about the format, Great Game, and how much you disagree with the militarisation of KSP here, though.

Links

  • Website: Webite
  • Forum: Forum
  • Nation Spreadsheet: KGG Nation Sheet
You might get some use out of the ruling here.
